mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAT_MESSAGE_INFO(CMI_SENDER_UI_NUM, CMI_RECEIVE_UI_NUM, CMI_MESSAGE, CMI_SENT_TIME) VALUES(#{cmiSenderUiNum}, #{cmiReceiveUiNum}, #{cmiMessage}, #{cmiSentTime})
mapper.select:
SELECT *, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM CHAT_MESSAGE_INFO WHERE CMI_SENDER_UI_NUM=#{cmiSenderUiNum} AND CMI_RECEIVE_UI_NUM=#{cmiReceiveUiNum} AND CMI_RECEIVED_TIME IS NULL) AS UNREAD_CNT
FROM CHAT_MESSAGE_INFO WHERE (CMI_SENDER_UI_NUM = #{cmiSenderUiNum} AND CMI_RECEIVE_UI_NUM = #{cmiReceiveUiNum}) OR (CMI_SENDER_UI_NUM = #{cmiReceiveUiNum} AND CMI_RECEIVE_UI_NUM = #{cmiSenderUiNum}) ORDER BY CMI_SENT_TIME ASC
